title: Disabling minions and neutral monsters for custom games
body: If minions and neutral monsters could be disabled for custom games it could allow a wider variety of custom games that could be played and would also help custom games such as draft racing to be much simpler to play and stop people from cheating. Thank you for reading and I hope you take this into consideration as I will be very happy if this becomes an option for custom games.

replies.body: Yeah would be a cool option. Not a bad idea =D
